Title: June 2016
Content: 17*p46621a01724*turn over    	do not write in this area	do not write in this area	do not write in this area7	 the scientific article you have studied is from science news.	use the information from the article and your own knowledge to answer the following questions.	(a)	 ginkgo bioworks could engineer a bacterium to ‘suck carbon dioxide out of the atmosphere’ (paragraph 5).		(i)	 suggest why there may be a need to ‘suck carbon dioxide out of the atmosphere’.(2)		*(ii)	 suggest how ginkgo bioworks could engineer such a bacterium.(6)
